lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis won the 84 Lumber Classic by two shots with a two-under-par 70 at Farmington, Pa. Curtis, the 2003 British Open winner, captured his third PGA Tour title. He finished at 14-under 274. Charles Howell III was second, shooting a final-round 72.
